comment: This was a great show. Mr. Cantwell is an amiable high energy host and I was very glad to be part of this. Thanks to him for having me on, and to all of you who called in.
amr:
# ::snt This was a great show. Mr. Cantwell is an amiable high energy host and I was very glad to be part of this. Thanks to him for having me on, and to all of you who called in.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / show-04
            :mod (g / great)
            :domain (t / this))
      :snt2 (a / and
            :op1 (p / person
                  :ARG0-of (h / host-01)
                  :mod (a2 / amiable)
                  :mod (e / energy
                        :ARG1-of (h2 / high-02))
                  :domain (p2 / person
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Mr."
                              :op2 "Cantwell")))
            :op2 (g2 / glad-02
                  :ARG0 (h3 / have-part-91
                        :ARG1 (t2 / this)
                        :ARG2 (ii / i))
                  :ARG1 ii
                  :degree (v / very)))
      :snt3 (t3 / thank-01
            :ARG1 (a3 / and
                  :op1 (h4 / he)
                  :op2 (y / you
                        :mod (a4 / all)
                        :ARG0-of (c / call-in-04)))
            :ARG2 (h5 / have-03
                  :ARG0 h4
                  :ARG1 (ii2 / i))))

comment: I must agree that today was a great episode. I've been kinda hostile to the concept of nihilism, for reasons we discussed on the show. But I found it difficult to disagree with the way Brett framed things, and he gave me a lot to think about.
amr:
# ::snt I must agree that today was a great episode. I've been kinda hostile to the concept of nihilism, for reasons we discussed on the show. But I found it difficult to disagree with the way Brett framed things, and he gave me a lot to think about.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (o / obligate-01
            :ARG1 (ii / i)
            :ARG2 (a / agree-01
                  :ARG0 ii
                  :ARG1 (e / episode
                        :mod (g / great)
                        :domain (t / today))))
      :snt2 (h / hostile
            :degree (k / kind-of)
            :domain (ii2 / i)
            :topic (c / concept
                  :mod (n / nihilism))
            :ARG1-of (c2 / cause-01
                  :ARG0 (r / reason
                        :ARG1-of (d / discuss-01
                              :ARG0 (w / we)
                              :location (s / show-04)))))
      :snt3 (c3 / contrast-01
            :ARG2 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (f / find-01
                        :ARG0 (ii3 / i)
                        :ARG1 (d2 / difficult
                              :domain (d3 / disagree-01
                                    :ARG0 ii3
                                    :ARG1 (w2 / way
                                          :manner-of (f2 / frame-01
                                                :ARG0 (p / person
                                                      :name (n2 / name
                                                            :op1 "Brett"))
                                                :ARG1 (t2 / thing))))))
                  :op2 (g2 / give-01
                        :ARG0 p
                        :ARG1 t2
                        :quant (l / lot)
                        :ARG1-of (t3 / think-01
                              :ARG0 ii3))
                  :ARG2 ii3)))
